exp_summary2: Apply methods and techniques of Agile teaming methodology. Convert clients requirements into actionable items that can be implemented in a user-interface through utilizing the latest mobile, web and touch screen technologies. Design and develop user interface prototypes, Work closely with product owner to develop and administer user experience research, and provide analyses and recommendations from QC to develop and deploy web/mobile-baseduser interfaces. Participate in all phases of the software development cycle. Turn customer needs into elements of user interface design and apply an approachable and powerful experience to how the interface looks and works
exp_summary3: UI Designing for I-phone, Maintain the company branding, Creating Web application & Graphic Designing using JQuery, XHTML, CSS ,Javascript, Dreamweaver & Photoshop
exp_summary4: Work with front end engineering and UI teams to define requirements Create clean and maintainable front end code from requirements such as clickable prototypes and mock-ups Develop a pixel perfect UI with a mobile first approach Create and maintain a UI living style guide Create and maintain high CSS code coverage for visual regression and performance/optimization testing Identify and communicate best practices to front-end engineering team Deliver on time with best quality, W3C validated, and cross browsers front end code possible

name: Karthik M
headline: Managing Director and Founder
summary: Experienced, strategic director of online marketing with an extensive career in online marketing (14 years ) driving online sales using the entire online marketing mix (affiliate marketing, display advertising, email marketing, paid search and search engine optimization). Track record of increasing online sales performance driven by in-depth and extensive knowledge of online marketing strategy, strong negotiating skills and networking within the online marketing ecosystem. Specialties: Internet Marketing, Online Marketing audits, Digital Marketing Strategy, Online Business Turnaround, Paid Search Optimisation, Analytics, Fractional Attribution and Econometric modelling.

linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-12690037, id:-32405006, name:-Scott Fawcett, created_date:-2011-12-20 04:16:22, date_and_relationship:-2011-12-20 04:16:22, Scott managed Karthik, headline:-Divisional Managing Director at Essentra, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/smtfawcett/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAiaAAAAJGM4NWMwZTQ3LTdkYzEtNGVlMi1hZmMzLWQ0NjRjZTZjZThhMw.jpg, summary:-I recruited Karthik to lead Online Acquisition Marketing at Electrocomponents. At the time this was a new role with somewhat unknown potential. Karthik grasped the opportunity and demonstrated the potential of online for new customer acquisition, especially search marketing. This led to a significant increase in paid search activity within a few months of him arriving. Within a year Online marketing became a major part of the groups marketing activities and budgets.- this would not have been possible without Karthiks knowledge, delivery and guidance. Karthik is a real expert in online acquisition marketing who has delivered significant results in client organisations. I would strongly recommend working with Karthik in this field and listening carefully to his advice. <> profile_member_id:-11448882, id:-14931481, name:-David Lloyd, created_date:-2009-12-01 20:35:45, date_and_relationship:-2009-12-01 20:35:45, Karthik is client of David, headline:-Managing Director, UK & Nordics at Alibaba Group, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-lloyd-616a013/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAiTAAAAJDk3MjY5ZTY2LTg1ZjItNDk5NS04YTEwLTM3NzI2YmNkMzNhNg.jpg, summary:-Karthik has a tremendous depth of knowledge around eCommerce, and is particularly skilful in how he uses paid and natural search to drive profitable increases in revenue for his employer. He's also a very friendly and entertaining guy, who's a pleasure to work with. What really impresses me about Karthik is how he can draw out crucial details and see the big picture while juggling so much information. The online world is data-rich and it's all too easy to get bogged down in detail, so to be able to understand that detail entirely while also thinking strategically is a rare asset. <> profile_member_id:-15942105, id:-14526379, name:-Kevin Thompson, created_date:-2009-11-12 05:28:31, date_and_relationship:-2009-11-12 05:28:31, Kevin senior than Karthik, headline:-General Manager at Electrocomponents PLC, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/kevinseanthompson/, summary:-Karhik is one of the most experienced SEO and SEM experts I have had the pleaseure of working with. Always pleasant to work with and courteous to a fault, I enjoyed working with Karthik enormously - I'm sure we'll keep in touch long into the future.

exp_summary1: Online Marketing agency based in the UK, UAE and India specialising in online marketing consultancy, audits and strategy for enterprise-level online marketing programs, paid search marketing, LinkedIN advertising and optimising analytical and reporting processes. We currently manage multi-million pound campaigns across 17 countries in Europe and APAC; we also provide comprehensive audits of and strategic consultancy for enterprise level online marketing.
exp_summary2: Responsible for online revenue generation across Europe, Middle East, Africa and Asia Pacific for 10 brands of the Hilton Worldwide group. Designed and executed the online marketing plan for EMEA and APAC. 	In charge of P & L for online spends in excess of USD 21 million 	Improved top lines whilst decreasing costs by radically changing the online marketing strategy within the 1st quarter on the job. YoY revenues grew by 38% whilst acquisition costs went down by 17% 	Grew paid search revenues by 28%, display revenue by 300%, and affiliate marketing revenues by 125% within a year along with better ROIs in paid search and display 	Grew the team from two to 8, training and developing their tactical skills whilst troubleshooting issues related to team and inter-departmental dynamics 	Led workshops/presentations to evangelise online marketing to the various marketing departments within the company 	Grew the budgetary contributions for paid search from hotels by 40% in a year 	Ditching a click-based fractional attribution model, evolved a statistical econometric modeling of the relationship between various online media to determine the commercial value of online advertising 	Strategised complex paid search programs with 33 million keyphrases and multiple matrixed reporting systems 	Re-drew the entire paid search strategy and introduced multiple tactical optimization methods 	Introduced off-page SEO to the company and increased the Google SERPs for 85% of the targeted keyphrases 	Led a very successful social media campaigns in UK and DE
exp_summary3: Responsible for the groups strategy for online customer acquisitions across 26 countries. Responsible for the online (acquisition) marketing mix, budgetary allocation, and cost control within a matrix structure and securing management buy-in. Working together with online marketing managers across 26 countries to disseminate best practices relating to online customer acquisition strategy, ensuring implementation of strategy and guiding agency relationships towards achieving targets and branding objectives. Evolving commercial metrics, defining incrementality and securing budgets to increase online customer acquisition and incremental revenue.

Predictive analytics is a vast domain encompassing data extraction, data cleansing, predicting trends and behavioral patterns and employ a large number of software such as R, SAS, SPSS, MATLAB, etc. With the advent of Big Data Engineering and related software such as Hadoop this field has only grown. A host of industries from Retail, Healthcare, Marketing and Financial Services to Telecommunication, Travel and Actuarial Sciences now use Predictive Analytics to gain insights in their businesses. To further the interests and intellectual capital of professionals from this community we encourage posting of recent technological developments and other related articles. One can find articles on Effective Data Mining, Big Data Engineering, Advances on Hadoop, Data sciences, Statistics, Communication Skills, Business Intelligence, Visualization tools, Business and Web analytics, predictive modeling, Effective Data Mining, Business Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Analysis, Cloud Computing, Relational Databases, Text Mining, and many more. AIM was started in May 2012 by Bhasker Gupta, who has worked in analytics space for more than 12 years. Today, AIM is driven by Bhaskers vision to create a hub for thousands of analytics professionals across India. AIM is the pre-eminent source of news, information and analysis for the Indian analytics ecosystem, covering news, thought articles, research works and case studies. The website was established with the aim to evangelize analytics in India through healthy discussion and idea dissemination on next gen analytics within India. This has led us to talk about topics like education, events and latest trends in analytics. We regularly profile prominent leaders and companies in this space and will continue to do so. What started as a one man endeavour is now an information powerhouse with more than 150 eminent authors writing about their thoughts on analytics. Analytics India Magazine hosts Indias most wide-reaching flagship conferences on analytics called CYPHER. AIMs Analytics India Jobs connects analytics companies and talent in the most curated manner. Thank you for being a part of our journey. Were continuously working towards bettering the platform and wed love to hear from our wonderful community of readers about your thoughts and views on how we can provide more value. Please feel free to write to us at info@analyticsindiamag.com for any feedback or queries. name: Linneaus Emmy
headline: Engineering Manager, Data and Analytics
summary: I am a seasoned BI professional with strong experience in design and development of world class analytical solutions. I have a strong data engineering background with deep understanding of Data modeling concepts. I enjoy building realtime analytics solutions including ELT, data summarization and visualization. As a Big data solution architect I design BI applications for both row and column storage and have hands on experience in scaling systems to perform massive read and write operations. I am a self motivated leader and foster a very collaborative work culture. I like being challenged, as I see an opportunity in every challenge. Specialties:  Data warehouse Design and Development using Teradata,Oracle,Vertica  PL/SQL, SQL, Unix Shell scripting, Java,Python  OBIEE,Business Objects, Tableau,Essbase  Data streaming platform using Messaging Platforms/Kafka/Storm  Big data, Large scale data ingestion, Distributed systems  Product and People Management  Data Extraction, ETL , Informatica

exp_summary4: Here i worked as a R&D (S/W ) Engineer . First year i worked for a Delphi projects witrh Oracle Backend . Navision to Oracle Data posting tools by using C/ODBC. Developed Some Reporting Systems by making Navision (Native) as a Back-end and Delphi as a Front -End . Implemented Some Integrations b/w Navision ERP to Local Oracle tools. arfter that by intrest i moved to Navision ERP TechnoFunctional , I developed some Reports & Functionalities with functional Procedures

exp_summary1: Head complete gamut of HR & Administration across Chennai and Madurai regions.
exp_summary2: Work closely with Finance, Operations and IT in terms of manpower forecasting. Based on the numbers arrive at mapping headcounts Vs. seats. Seat Management, Creation of ID Cards, Access cards etc., in terms of any new joiners. Execute movement between sites based on business requirement and increase capacity utilization. Manage CCTV and Access control systems. Publish time sheet periodically to calibrate the working hours of staffs. Implementation of Centralized monitoring station, thereby making all the facility 24/7 Surveillance. Asset Management Conduct Internal Audits and publish reports.
exp_summary3: Recruitment strategy & initiatives. Employee On boarding. Established and rolled out policies HR Policies and Procedures. Identified the gaps in Statutory Compliance and made the organization 100% proven statutory compliance (PF, ESI, PT, LWF, Abstracts, timely filing of returns etc.,) Developed and rolled out Employee Handbook. SPOC  Related to any policy and procedure matters for staffs. Roll out Annual HR and Training Calendar. Established EWS thereby reduce attrition and plan for succession. Manage Asset Insurance, GMC, GPA including renewals and settlement of claims. On time and Accurate Sign off of payroll, Incentives, and Reimbursements. Employee Engagement & Welfare. Manage company Annual Trips, Events, CSR, Employee Birthdays, R&R programs, Brown bag sessions. Monthly Town Hall and Skip Level meetings Budgeting Derived KRAs for all levels Conducted compensation benchmark survey and align Salary with the organizations mission, goals and priorities. Implemented salaries competitively with the marketplace; and provided flexibility to accommodate changes in organization growth. Planned and organized the employee skill matrix which lead to the implementation of effective resource planning and cross functional training's Implemented training need analysis tools at executive level to identify high potential performers with talent share and developmental opportunities Organized Professional Development Programs through external trainers, customize modules as per our requirements. Publish monthly business review dashboards. Work closely with Sr. Management at USA and other Line Managers in India to cater the need of business. Exit formalities including F&F. Complete Facility Administration including Vendor Management, Procurement, etc.,
exp_summary4: Innovative Recruitment strategies to arrive at optimum numbers during Ramp-up. Organize and lead the new hire orientation/ on boarding process for designated business group. Work closely with senior leaders in business to understand their requirements of HR & to help them with their needs. Regular Employee Feedback Session. Rolled out monthly objective based R&R Programs. Organized well being programs, indoor and outdoor sports, cultural activities, theme celebrations for the employees which brought in a good result, with reduced absenteeism and turnover rates. Monthly HR report (Headcount, Recruitment details, Staff Experience , Attrition, Absenteeism, Departmental highlights). Create Job description for all positions and update based on business requirements. Developed 'service level agreements' and Key Performance Indicators for each team member resulting in greater internal customer satisfaction Rolled out 80% Objective based Performance Appraisal. Manage Performance Appraisal cycle for all employees including Confirmations, Half yearly, Annual appraisal, promotions, addressing performance related issues, TNA etc., Prepare and manage yearly Training calendar, coordinate and execute training programs. Measure ROI and effectiveness of the program. Perform Climate Survey at all levels. Extensive analysis of data and interpret on various angles, take appropriate measures to address various needs to the greater possible extent. Responsible for timely payroll process including compliance of Income tax and professional tax. Execute Disciplinary action starting from Oral/Written Warning up to Termination of Employees based on severity of issues. Automation of HRMS. Certified internal Auditor and played a major role in implementation of ISO. Part of QMS team, conduct internal and vendor Audit, ensure all observations and NCs are rectified. Manage complete facility Administration.
exp_summary5: Work closely with Technical Team understand and cater their requirements. Maintain employees Personal records. Handled complete Payroll and Incentives processing, ensure timeliness and accuracy. Maintenance of Employees records and implementation of Human Resource Information System. Oversee the performance management process to ensure 100% completion of performance evaluations annually accompanied by valuable feedback discussions, clear goals and objectives established, identified needs for development and commitment. Handle Queries related to Policy matters. Establish a reporting mechanism for exit interview data, including identifying a potential outsourcing partner and conduct exit interviews as necessary. Oversee the progressive disciplinary process and participate in termination meetings as necessary. Monitor the turnover statistics for the business group and investigate areas of concerns.
exp_summary6: Recruitment through Campus hires, newspaper Advertisements and references. On-boarding of new staffs. Open Bank accounts, ESI and PF accounts, generate ID and Access cards for all staffs. Employee relations and engagement activities. Execute Performance Management process for staffs. HR SPOC for the Business unit. In charge of Statutory Compliance Attendance and leave details to finance team to process payroll Exit formalities
exp_summary7: Preparation of Training Materials Handling Process Training at In-house and Vendor Sites Played a role of Training Coordinator New hire Orientation

name: Dhinesh Rajarathinam
headline: Wildlife Photographer | Marketing Copywriter | Email Marketer | Technical Writer
summary: A yearn for writing converted this professional engineer to a professional writer. After writing course materials for students and trainers, I moved on to write marketing descriptions for e-commerce websites. Exploring the online platform, I learnt a lot about online marketing and e-commerce store management. My passion for photography keeps the creative person in me going. Having dipped my fingers in various facets of the online shopping world encourages me to unravel its mysteries and learn more.

Crowdfunding is the merger of group funding and social networking. While group funding dates back millennia, the social networking aspects of crowdfunding are quite new, and are a major driving force behind this revolutionary form of financing. Building on social networking, crowdfunding creates a vehicle for people to invest or pledge money to projects for which they have an interest, a passion, or some other kind of attachment. In doing so, it creates a marketplace opportunity for a diversity of players. The Crowdfunding 360 Group is for professionals interested in crowdfunding and entrepreneurs using crowdfunding to raise capital. exp_summary2: MARKETING COPYWRITER | CLIENT MANAGEMENT | BUSINESS WRITING | CORPORATE COMMUNICATIONS | TRAINING Content Strategization and Writing * Creating blogging strategy and writing blogs for company website * Creating profiles, articles, and relevant material to be posted on various social and professional websites * Creating blogs, articles, press releases, and other content for US, UK, and Australian clients * Designing Facebook ads, LinkedIn and PPC ads for paid promotion * Created and run Facebook sweepstakes * Created content and designed layout for infographics * Created content for landing pages Business Presentations * Designing and creating professional presentations using Prezi * Created presentations on products and services offered by clients * Mentionable projects: British Council, Insight, Microsoft Products Email Marketing * Planning and executing email campaigns * Creating email content based on promotions and offers * Coordinating with the development team in designing the email template * Schedule email deliveries based on market research and email content * Monitor email delivery rate and track email click-through rate * Bring in clients through email marketing Language Training * Providing communication and vocal training for call executives * Language and communication training Client Management * Coordinating with clients, both through calls and mails, regarding their requirements and business objectives * Ensuring seamless information transfer regarding client requirements to the team * Preparing business proposal documents to be sent to clients * Preparing non-disclosure agreement and other vital documents essential for client engagement
exp_summary3: Project Management: I manage the entire project from planning to delivery. My tasks involve understanding client requirements and communicating it to the team. Delivery Management: My key responsibility area as a team lead involves ensuring on-time project delivery. I am also responsible for ensuring the quality of the final output. Documentation: As a part of my role as a team lead, I was responsible for creating and maintaining various project related documents such as the Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Project Requirement Document (PRD), Client feedback, Process Flow, Quality and Production Metrics. Mentoring: My tasks as a team lead also involved mentoring my teammates. To identify their talents in different styles of writing, project management and other areas, and help them improve their abilities. Projects Handled: Content-based Projects: Product descriptions for electronic-based online stores Listing  Amazon, eBay, Magento, WooCommerce, OS Commerce, inkFrog, Big Commerce, Facebook, Google Merchant Communicating with the client to understand their requirements and pass it on to the team Interact with the client everyday regarding daily tasks, priorities and feedback Prepare proposals for content-based projects and pitch for projects ECOM STORE MANAGEMENT Create online stores in Amazon/eBay, manage product listing and order processing Checking stock in and stock outs and periodically updating them online Responsibilities include ensuring regular updating of products, crosschecking orders with stock and communicating with the buyers and clarifying their doubts Create email campaigns for special/festival offers, discounts and sales according to client requirement Preparing the campaign template with content and images Schedule emails to be sent to all the responders in the email list provided by the client Analyze email campaign results and response to identify the reach Deals posting on deal forums and other related online pages
exp_summary4: Content Writer: I was involved in writing product descriptions and blogs for e-commerce websites. From clothing and toys to electronics and furniture, I created content for a variety of niches. Quality Control: As a part of my responsibilities, I edited freelancer files to ensure adherence to quality standards. Team Management: I was responsible for a small team of 3  4 members. As a part of my responsibilities, I had to ensure the team members met the required quality and productivity standards for client deliveries. Projects Handled: I worked for an US-based e-commerce shopping site, furniture stores and clothing retailers.
exp_summary5: Instructional Designer: As an ID writer, I was involved in writing course materials for clients based in US, Australia and Europe. As a part of my duties as an instructional designer, I was responsible for creating the complete course, describe the images in the material and also provide easy navigation routes, which will allow students to easily read the study material. Quality Control: After the material is converted into web courses by the developers, I was responsible for checking the quality and ensure adherence to the quality levels before the completed course is sent to the client. As a part of my duties, I also had to ensure that the materials have adhered to the SCORM and MSTP regulations. Developer: I was also involved in developing course using the LECTORA (elearning software). This software requires XM L/HTML programming knowledge. Client Coordination: As a part of my duties, I was also involved in client communication. My responsibilities included understanding client requirements and passing it the developers, graphic artists and integrators in the team. I was also responsible for the deliverables and incorporating feedback, if any. Team Management: I was responsible for a team of 6  8 members, including graphic artists, developers, integrators and junior writers. My work profile including coordinating all the work to ensure the course material is completely developed. Projects Handled: I have written course materials for subjects related to finance, medical studies, cell phones and automobile parts.

headline: President at ADP India Private Ltd.
summary: Management executive, leadership role, experience in managing diverse business lines - HR outsourcing, Payroll outsourcing , Consulting and HR automation, Experienced search consultant with track record of recruiting candidates for leadership roles; specific expertise in outsourcing industry, IT sector, BPO sector, offshore outsourcing; Extensive work has been done in semiconductor design industry, upstream oil and gas sector; Extensive international recruitment experience across Europe and Middle East ( GCC countries) - UAE, Qatar, Oman,Bahrain, Kuwait UK and India;

edu_school_name1: Institute of Finance and International Management
exp_summary2: Leading company in India which offers range of HR solutions integrating Outsourcing, Consulting and automation. MCSL is a group company of Ma Foi Randstad. Specific service offerings are : -HR Outsourcing, payroll and benefits outsourcing, statutory compliance outsourcing - HR Consulting ( people and productivity solutions , organization structuring, Roles and responsibility mapping, Performance Management system, Compensation Benchmarking and structuring and Employee Engagement and climate studies) - HR Automation for companies wanting to automate administrative and process led HR functions through deployment of a comprehensive 18 module HRMS Suite ( HRMS)
exp_company_name3: Ma Foi Randstad Management Consultants Ltd.
exp_summary3: Returned to India after integrating international offices with Randstad under the new international re-organization plan
exp_title4: Regional Head for EMEA ; CEO at Ma Foi Consultants Europe Ltd
exp_summary4: Leading a team of highly enthusiastic and trained Recruitment and HR consultants based in 6 Countries - London ( UK) ; Dubai & Abu Dhabi (UAE); Muscat (Oman); Bahrain ; Kuwait and Doha ( Qatar) Responsible for managing operations , growth in the region and partner relationships Buidling focus and depth across these Industry verticals through facilitating cross border movement of professionals- Banking & Financial Services, Energy & Infrastructure ; IT and Consumer Retail & Services. Advising clients on a range of Recruitment and HR related services which include Executive Search ; Selection ; Project Staffing /RPO services ; HR outsourcing

name: Mohammed Mubashir Meddekar
headline: iOS Developer at Zoho Corporation
summary: Two+ year hands on experience in developing mobile applications using iOS and Android. He easily adapts to the environment, having worked both in a team as well as a solo developer. He has experience of developing mobile application interacting with .NET web services, connected to SQL Server database. He has used SCRUM development methodology. He shared the daily SCRUM meeting and in the absence of SCRUM master, he filled-in as Scrum Master to get the job done by coordinating with the product owner to take up his feedbacks on the sprints and changing the backlog when required. He managed his backlogs, bug lists, and code in the Microsoft Team Foundation Server using GIT source code management technique. He is a self-learner having android on his own. He volunteered to take up the challenge to work in the technology and learn by self, by browsing and attending online courses. The biggest challenge he faced was learning a new technology without any help. He struggled a lot during his early days. But, later he did it, and can able to develop couple of applications like, Verbum and Learn ABC. He was the first to initiate the company book club by reviewing a book Good Business. Also, reviewed other books as well. He managed the companys app review team where we review other high-rated apps. He loves conducting cultural events. Conducted Hibrise Got Talent, companys annual event, which enabled the folks to explore their talents and develop camaraderie with fellow colleagues.

Membership to this group is open, but is intended for those working or studying in fields directly related to public health, including but not limited to health-related NGOs, governmental bodies and medical services, as well as individuals involved in public health research, policy or reporting and/or holding related professional degrees. A related GPH Facebook group can be found at: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2381431725415547/ <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=2168312&goback=, group_name:-Addiction Psychiatry, no_of_members:-5863, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/2/000/02d/1ae/3dade80.png, group_id:-2168312, group_description:-A group where all professionals can discuss , ask , and collaborate with other professionals with everything concerning addictions and psychiatry in general <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=3642192&goback=, group_name:-Doctors in Research, no_of_members:-3874, group_id:-3642192, group_description:-This group is to provide a way for physicians to ask questions about clinical research to others in the same situations. This organization will help doctors decide whether to get more involved in research, find ways to fix problems in their current programs. Ongoing network that is for doctors. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=4209779&goback=, group_name:-EPA Early Career Psychiatrists, no_of_members:-698, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/18e/05e/19936b8.png, group_id:-4209779, group_description:-Early career psychiatric professionals have to adapt to rapid changes in modern health systems in various fields such as ethics, politics and economics. This presents additional challenges as in shaping their professional identity. To face these aspects and to cover the growing international character of professional living, the Early Career Psychiatrists Committee of the European Psychiatric Association (EPA) aims to give young professionals a voice in the evolution of training, research and practice standards to enable them to take influence on their own future and career progress. The Early Career Psychiatrists Committee established a Programme at the annual European Congress of Psychiatry organised by EPA, including special symposia, happy hour meetings, interactive continuing medical education courses, get-together events and meet-the-experts-sessions where young professionals have the possibility to learn from highly achieved European leaders by communicating with them in an informal way. To support the scientific offspring, special prizes on psychiatric Research and on Prevention are awarded to early career psychiatrists. In addition a Scholarship Programme was introduced in 2007 to ensure the continuity of professional support to highly promising trainees and to start building European networks of which the scholars can take advantages in a life-long way. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=120372&goback=, group_name:-Global Public Health, no_of_members:-223460, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/029/08c/1f06119.png, group_id:-120372, group_description:-LinkedIn's largest public health group, GPH is a group for those working professionally or studying areas of international public health importance, with a focus on health issues impacting low- and middle-income countries. name: Hari Raghavendra
headline: Advanced Manufacturing at FormFactor Inc.
summary: I am a Mechanical Engineer with a background in product design, manufacturing/MEMs processes, integration and product life-cycle management. In my current role, I support new process development, technology transfer and yield planning on state-of-the-art wafer fabrication facility for development of Wafer Probe Cards (ATE) - testing SoC, DRAM and Flash memory devices. My Focus Areas: New Product/Process Development| MEMs| Manufacturing| Electro-Mechanics| FEA| GD&T | Micro-fabrication| Metals & Plastics | Failure Analysis| Process Control My Software Proficiency: Pro-E(Creo)| SolidWorks(2011)| ANSYS (Workbench 14.5)| Abaqus(6.12) | MATLAB(8.3)| LabVIEW| JMP My Hardware Proficiency: Prototype Machine Shop Tools | CNCs| Rapid Prototyping| DAQs| PLCs| Sensors | Confocal Laser Microscopes| SEM | AFM| FIB| X-Ray Tomography Clean Room Proficiency: PECVD | ICP-DRIE| Photolithography | RIE | PVD| Wafer Bonding Systems| Optical Metrology| Electro-Plating

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-Epstein, name:-Maximilian Epstein, date_and_relationship:-2016-03-08 22:27:01, Hari senior than Maximilian, created_date:-2016-03-08 22:27:01, summary:-I have known Maximilian Epstein (Max) in professional and personal capacity for over two years. He comes across as an astute engineer with great hands-on skills and exemplary inter-personal abilities. Within a year of joining the organization (Stimulation Group) from school, Max impressed us all with his ability to handle demanding workloads and engineered pragmatic solutions to complex problems on the shop floor in areas such as equipment hydraulics, solid mechanics, engineering design verification and validation. Seeing his potential, our manager instantly pitched for his intra-department transfer (to the Multiplus team) as soon as a ME vacancy arose. His transition into the new role as a design engineer was effortless  he was responsible for design, testing and improvement of a metal-to-metal spring-loaded hydraulic seal -and he even juggled multiple projects during the transition phase. He was also given the additional responsibility of leading the safety and loss prevention team that consisted of around 50 senior-level engineers and upper management, a role only given to engineers with considerable on-the-job experience. This was testament to Maxs potential in which he handled some precarious situations involving general safety and equipment rigging risks with ease and improved the overall efficiency of our lab operations. Beyond his strong engineering and managerial skills, Max brings a lot of energy and professionalism that can be infectious!, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAYBAAAAJGQxNWYyYWE0LWJjNDUtNGRjNi05MmIwLTJkYmQ5Y2EwNGI0MQ.jpg, profile_member_id:-163284023, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/maximilianepstein/, recommendation_id:-582254001

linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-163284023, id:-574523911, name:-Maximilian Epstein, created_date:-2015-08-18 09:44:11, date_and_relationship:-2015-08-18 09:44:11, worked in same group, headline:-Salesforce Lead, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/maximilianepstein/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAYBAAAAJGQxNWYyYWE0LWJjNDUtNGRjNi05MmIwLTJkYmQ5Y2EwNGI0MQ.jpg, summary:-I have had the pleasure of working with Hari on the Schlumberger Multiplus Project--an autonomous electro-mechanical pump down actuation device, used for intelligent stimulation in oil field services. Hari was an excellent asset to the Multiplus team as he is very competent in mechanical engineering, mechanical CAD, mechanics of materials, electronics, control systems, supply chain, economics, DFM and DFA. Not only does Hari have a strong spectrum of technical knowledge, but he has a great work ethic and is extremely self motivated. The characteristics that Hari posses, have allowed him to make timely progress in the electro-mechanical designs and applications of the Multiplus project without compromising safety or the quality of his work. It is for these reasons that I would highly recommend Hari Rajagopalan for any engineering project. He truly is a team player, and most certainly enhances the performance of the colleagues that surround him. <> profile_member_id:-97153026, id:-565022361, name:-Benjamin Yu, created_date:-2015-02-12 13:33:08, date_and_relationship:-2015-02-12 13:33:08, worked in same group, headline:-Project Manager, Energy Efficiency | Founder, LighthouseLanguage.com: Your reliable Chinese translation partner, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/bingyiyu/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/0e4/0a0/33786f4.jpg, summary:-It was a pleasure to work with Hari in our graduate research laboratory and I would do so again should chance grant an opportunity. In the many instances where we discussed work plans, Hari helped brainstorm, prioritize, conclude, and act on ideas. These sessions provided me insight into fluid dynamics simulation efforts when my progress was impeded. In seeking advice, Hari was introspective, humble, and teachable, forming novel conclusions and solutions from tangential knowledge offered by our colleagues and me. Haris skill in synthesis is an asset in any organization dependent on multi-function collaboration. Work in our group was by no means singular in function. Hari was skilled in both hands-on and computer-based work, making extra efforts in the evenings and weekends, at the bench and at the computer, to ensure simulated results are proven with experiments. Adding emotional intelligence to his already industrious nature, Hari recognized and acted on the needs of others. Responding to our advisers high expectations of work that led to short timelines, Hari impressed with quality and quantity of progress during weekly reports. Of course, Haris technical knowledge is solid, self-evident in not only his career progress but also his publications. The pairing of his engineering knowhow with soft skills ultimately resulted in papers and presentations at international trade association conferences. His contributions were above what was expected of his role at the time of a Masters student during two years of study and certainly improves the state of the art of current technological knowhow in micro-manufacturing. Hari undoubtedly would be an asset to any endeavor that would have him. <> profile_member_id:-12409170, id:-549325064, name:-Andrey Bogdan, created_date:-2015-01-31 11:31:06, date_and_relationship:-2015-01-31 11:31:06, Andrey senior than Hari, headline:-Senior Scientist | Technical Leader | Math. modeling & Data analysis, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrey-bogdan-2961a54/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAy9AAAAJGYzYWE4OTY3LTgwODgtNDg2NC05ZTIwLTJkNzEzODNhYThiZA.jpg, summary:-I had pleasure to work with Hari and watch him accomplishing complicated technical project. linkedin_volunteer_experiences: volunteer_role:-Bike Builder, volunteer_cause:-CHILDREN, organization_name:-Elvis & More, description:-We focus on at-risk children living in Greater Houston, an eight-county area in which 330,000 children live in poverty. Most of these kids spend their childhood "on-foot" and the "earning" of the bicycle at YE helps them to do achieve more in life., start_date_year:-2014, start_date_month:-10, end_date_year:-2014, end_date_month:-10
linkedin_publications: publication_title:-Autonomous Intelligent Pump Down Device, publisher:-REMS Production Symposium, Cambridge, Schlumberger, publication_date:-2014-9-14 <> publication_title:-Performance Evaluation of Meso-scale Flexible Cutting Tool for Micro-Groove Machining in Steel, publisher:-Proceedings of 8th International Conference on Micro-Manufacturing, University of Victoria, BC, Canada, publication_description:-This paper presents the performance evaluation of a meso-scale CBN flexible cutting tool when machining micro-grooves in steel. The machined micro-grooves are analyzed based on its expected geometry, floor surface profile, repeatability and consistency. Micro-grooves are found to be consistent and repeatable, and have well-defined rectangular cross-section. A series of experiments are conducted to study the influence of machining parameters and the stiffness of flexible tool on burr height. Single tool pass and low cutting load yield the lowest side burrs. Tool wear studies reveal that low applied cutting loads produce the longest tool life. The ability of the meso-scale flexible tool to machine complex micro-groove patterns in steel is also demonstrated., publication_date:-2013-3-23 <> publication_title:-Development of Meso-Scale Flexible Cutting Tool for Micro-Groove Machining in Stainless Steel, publication_url:-http://www.luminpdf.com/files/12141430/0077.pdf, publisher:-Proceedings of 7th International Conference on Micro-Manufacturing, Northwestern University, IL, publication_description:-This paper presents the development of a strain-gauge sensor-integrated meso-scale CBN (Cubic Boron Nitride) flexible cutting tool that is capable of machining micro-grooves in stainless steel. A MEMS (Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems) process-based approach is employed to fabricate the meso-scale cantilevers with integrated stain-gauge sensors. A novel approach for mounting and machining a single CBN crystal tool tip on the meso-scale cantilever and a suitable method for packaging the meso-scale CBN flexible cutting tool are developed. The performance characteristics of the strain-gauge sensor and the meso-scale cantilever are evaluated over a range of parameters that influence the groove cutting operations., publication_date:-2012-3-8
edu_activities2: Society of Automotive Engineer, Society of Mechanical Engineers, Shristi ( Linguistic Club), British Council
edu_activities3: Science Club Secretary 2004-05. Member of the Debate Team
exp_title1: Pr. MEMS Device Engineer - New Process Development & Operations
exp_summary1: - Develop new MEMS-based devices/processes - designed to test DRAM, NAND Flash, System-on-Chip wafer memory products. - Integrate defect characteristics and assign disposition protocols across photo-lithography, electro-plating, etch, metrology and planarization processes to improve reliability and performance of MEMS-based devices. - Define, monitor, and drive continuous improvement projects for process capability, cleanroom development and yield improvement through the use of statistical methodologies.
exp_summary2: Multi-Stage Stimulation - Completion Engineering for Unconventional Resources Fracturing o Functioned as the lead mechanical engineer for development of an autonomous intelligent actuator that travels in a cased pipe, detects a target, actuates and seals at a specified depth. o Designed and led DFM activities for a novel metal-to-metal spring-energized Aluminum seal technology o Developed the electro-mechanical tool architecture that houses the antenna, encapsulation, circuitry, & bulkhead feed-through connectors. o Performed engineering evaluations and technical feasibility studies on new business development opportunities o Developed a new cost-effective method of downhole antenna encapsulation for HVM. o Developed V&V plans to address tool reliability, factory acceptance criteria & final qualification for high pressure and high temperature conditions o Implemented a logic for PLC/Solenoid system to automate flow control valves in a hydraulic flow loop to improve product testing efficiency and work ergonomics. o Supported SLB Doll-Research Center in Boston for FEA/testing new concepts o Worked with cross-functional teams across Norway, Belfast and Houston to initiate manufacturing feasibility studies and development timeline on a new Safety Valve concept. .
exp_summary3: Nano CEMMS - Micro-Manufacturing / MEMS - Design of micro-machine tool systems for nano-micro level surface patterning applications on hard materials - Design and Fabrication of MEMS process-based flexible cutting tool based on beam theory to create micro-groove in Steel/Aluminum substrates - Advancement of Adaptive Euler-Lagrangian (ALE) coupled thermo-elastic 3D FEA model to validate tool design and process planning.
exp_summary4: - Worked as a team member of Materials Processing team, responsible for developing and applying advanced finite element methods (FEA) for manufacturing process simulation and numerical analysis. - Specifically, involved in creating Casting process simulations using MagmaSOFT to study and predict solidification patterns,mechanical properties, Niyama, thermal stresses and distortions during the process for CAT industrial machinaries. - Provided mechanical modeling, evaluations and post-processing data on thermal and stress analysis for structural components and sub-systems for both linear and non-linear problems using - Abaqus, Nastran NX.
exp_summary5: - Worked in the cutting tools business unit in collaboration with Iscar, Wertec and Ingersoll International Metalworking Companies (IMCs) . - Portfolio covered for automotive, engineering services and defense industries. - Involved in performance studies,new design testing, sales, product positioning and marketing strategy of ISO- Turning and Drilling tools, both standard and customized for Northern and Western India.
exp_summary6: Hands on experience on vehicle stability and steering geometry of multi-axle commercial vehicles.
exp_summary7: Studied and analyzed the assembly line of Genset Line. Developed an experimental process flow Line based on Assembly Line Balance (ALB) methods that significantly improved the throughput time by 3 mins and reduced the takt time by 7%.

name: Surya Chidambaram
headline: Leader without a Title
summary: My career technically began back in the 9th grade when I would work at my father's factory during my holidays. This continued when I was doing my undergrad at Loyola College, Chennai. I developed an interest in social media marketing and thus interned at Social Wavelength, Mumbai for a month. Then I came to begin working at my mother's company - OCE Study Abroad. I was then the Business Head here which is along with my MBA at Management Development Institute of Singapore ( MDIS). I then became the Brand Ambassador at OCE Study Abroad - the final step before I took over CEO of OCE Study Abroad and even appeared in The Hindu as Chennai's youngest Entrepreneur! Alongside that, I CoFounded Totum Support - trying to house all business services/ rebuilding of dying brands all under one roof. I moved onto one of my family businesses- Sun Industries India where it's basically making Sheet/ Pressed Metal Components to OEM manufacturers.

A community those looking to reach their best customers online through techniques like inbound marketing, search engine optimization (SEO) and social media. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=4371519&goback=, group_name:-Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Marketing and Retail, no_of_members:-67769, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/6/005/011/098/1d41f7a.png, group_id:-4371519, group_description:-As companies worldwide have been building up their data and analytical capabilities for several years now, many marketing, media and CRM managers would theoretically have at their disposal enough tools to get a better understanding of their consumers. But do they know how to achieve this? What are the challenges? This group provides a platform for experts to discuss analytics, machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) as relevant to marketing, media and retail. It shall offer questions and answers to all the issues people interested and involved in the area may encounter, such as: - Concepts and methodologies: visualisation, statistical analysis, econometrics, data mining, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), speech recognition, voice recognition, "Big Data" technology, Internet of Things (IOT), etc. - Applications: Market segmentation, customer profiling, optimisation, customer lifetime management, cross- / up-selling, demand forecasting, media mix modelling (MMM), attribution modelling, pricing, brand perception, sufficiency, advertising efficiency, KPI, optimisation, market basket analysis, fraud / anomaly detection, location optimisation, data management platforms (DMP), programmatic buying, sentiment analysis, chatbots, recommender systems, spam detection, search, social semantics, predictive customer service, ad targeting, content generation, etc. - Industries: Advertising, Automotive, Banking, Casino & Gaming, Consulting, Consumer Goods (CPG, FMCG), e-Commerce, Cosmetics, Financial Services, Government, Healthcare, Hospitality, Insurance, Luxury, Manufacturing, Market Research, Media, Oil & Gas, Pharmaceuticals, Retail & Distribution, Travel & Entertainment, Telecommunications, etc. - Challenges: Technology, data management, modelling, model evaluation, deployment, organisational issues, ROI, cultural change, talent acquisition, compliance, ethics, taxation, privacy, etc. Dear friends, the stage is yours! Also this will be a platform for budding entrepreneurs , this group will organize lot of Success talk and more... <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=6695354&goback=, group_name:-College Transfer Pathways, no_of_members:-1561, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/6/005/097/0b8/23ea25e.png, group_id:-6695354, group_description:-The College Transfer Pathways group is a place for higher education leaders and others to learn about, discuss, and share information on this topic. This group is maintained and curated by The Affordable College Public Benefit Corporation, a B Corp founded to help community college students afford and attain a bachelors degree. According to a recent survey by the organizers of The Affordable College Public Benefit Corporation, up to 56 percent of students who are currently enrolled in college are likely to transfer to another institution. The survey of 1,027 college students also found that transfer of most credits toward degree is the most important factor when selecting another institution. The inability to transfer credits, more than a lack of preparation or financial aid, is a key obstacle to graduation for students who move from a two-year to a four-year college, according to recent research by doctoral candidate David B. Monaghan (Sociology) and distinguished professor Paul Attewell (Sociology, Urban Education) of the Graduate Center of the City University of New York. The research reveals: the greater the loss, the lower the chances of completing a BA. In conjunction with The Advocate of Affordable College blog, this LinkedIn groups role is to ask questions, share original content and research, propose and discuss solutions  basically take the time to shed light on how college transfer impacts your institution or the higher education system as a whole. To do this, we encourage leaders from academia, business, and government to join this group, invite others at your institution to join it, participate in the discussion, and contribute your ideas or opinions. The college affordability and transfer problem can be alleviated and possibly even eliminated by dedicated professionals like you  stakeholders of your institution who take the time to get involved. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=3428054&goback=, group_name:-International Student: Recruitment, no_of_members:-36600, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAi6AAAAJDhjODhkYjljLTkwNDAtNDA1ZS1hYmM4LTk5YmI4YmE4M2U3Yw.png, group_id:-3428054, group_description:-Only Largest Group of Education agents, Universities/Institutes Abroad and other service provider for International Education Industry. name: Charulatha Vijayakumar
headline: Associate Software Engineer at Tech Mahindra
summary: AKA: Rakshini, Charu, Latha, Charu Rakshini. Specialties: User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) Designing, 2D Flash Animation Artist, Icon Designing, Responsive Web Site Designing, Photoshop Editing, Leadership, Public Speaking, Effective Communication and Presentation, Creative Content Developing and Poetry. Whats more interesting and curious than to think about how users perceive a software product and their experiences on it? With a year of Experience in User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) Designing as an Intern, I have learnt that the small things make a big difference and have acquired an eye for detail. My Experience includes transforming awesome ideas to designs, turning the designs into webpage front ends, implementing Flat User Interface (UI) to Web Pages, making Responsive Websites for different devices, creating Motion Graphics and Animation. I value and am passionate about Creativity, Animation, Designing, Poetry, Technology and Education, Leadership, Public Speaking, People Skills and Dancing. One of my greatest accomplishments is that I have been able to multitask with ease during which I had to study for my Bachelors Degree, do my Internship, as well as coordinate events successfully in my college as a Student Council Executive Member, all at the same time! I have also volunteered as a member in the Placement Team in which we had coordinated well for the Placement Drives that were conducted in our college!! As broadband internet access has become widespread throughout the world it is possible for businesses and entrepreneurs to manage remotely based teams to work on projects rather than the traditional model of outsourcing the work to a 3rd party provider. The advantages of this can be many, such as a lower overall cost, more direct control over a project, a smaller initial cost as well as greater flexibility in increasing or decreasing a workload. Whether your intention is to manipulate staff to improve their performance or encourage them to be better salespeople. exp_summary3: Business development for Microsoft Dynamics, Oracle solutions & services and Outsourcing Consultants on T & M Basis. 	Meeting clients, Requirement gathering, Conducting demos, Proposal preparation. 	Offshore development, Staffing & Outsourcing consultants (MS Dynamics, Oracle). 	Account Management. 	PMO activities for offshore development projects. 	Identify prospective customers and conduct research on their profile. 	Build strong relationship with prospects / customers. 	Access customer pain points & suggest solutions. 	Cold calling / follow up & nurture prospective leads for closure. 	Conducting webinars / events / workshops. 	Pipeline management and Sales Projections. 	Handling end to end sales & BD activities. 	Respond to and follow up on sales enquiries thoroughly. 	Identify prospects and markets opportunities. 	Maintain and develop a customer and prospect database.
exp_summary5: Title: Developing a new concept exclusive store Titan One. Project feasibility study involved: Prepared an market study based on the needs of the consumer towards the liking of titan brand products. Outlay the technical specification on the new store. Identifying the right prospect for titan One store Analyse and present the profit sharing for the new store for franchisees Assisting in the titan industries for their expansion geographically. Providing them the BEP(Cost analysis) on the new store in lieu of financial aspect. Goals achieved through this project: Concept of Maxmin is implemented.(i.e) Maximum gain and minimal loss. Cut short the project cost on the side of the company. Identifying the strategies to improve the sales and increasing revenue of the company by 5%. Thus the investment is minimal compared to the large store.This Microstore can help the investor to gain profit and risk of hefty loss is minimised. Customer complaints and redressal of the grevances are minimsed.due to the direct contact between the store owner and the company.

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-Bhatia, name:-Sachin Bhatia, date_and_relationship:-2011-07-29 04:10:16, Rajendran senior than Sachin, created_date:-2011-07-29 04:10:16, summary:-Sachin was always full of ideas to improve the situation, full of energy even at the end of the day when the rest of us start looking at the clock, and full of guts and gumption to face the irate client when the time came for the inevitable coverup for some screwup back home. An asset to have on your side, when the going gets tough. And, one would be a fool to not recognize the iron will, the career-focused executive, the opportunity-hunting business mind hiding under the child-like demeanor., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAyHAAAAJGQyY2ZlOGQwLWQwMDItNDEwYS04OTI3LWIwNjA4NmY0NzhhMg.jpg, profile_member_id:-13667527, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/sachinbhatia2009/, recommendation_id:-28593069 <> last_name:-Nair, name:-Gita Nair, date_and_relationship:-2009-06-15 19:43:01, worked in same group, created_date:-2009-06-15 19:43:01, summary:-The only problem with sporting silver hair, is people tend to brush you off as senior only for the age! Gita Nair though is all the good things that come from age and experience and none of the bad. I have worked with Gita while interacting with clients, while brainstorming on new ideas and initiatives, while handling sticky situations with layoffs and recruitments, and in every one of these, she has shown me what a cool head and clever brain she's got between those shoulders. Outspoken, honest and candid, but I have seen these as assets when used at the right time in the right manner, by people like Gita. Perhaps, that's why People Like Gita!, profile_member_id:-4819253, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/gita-nair-b057441/, recommendation_id:-11566421 <> last_name:-Rajagopalan, name:-Keerthivasan Rajagopalan, date_and_relationship:-2009-03-31 21:20:09, Rajendran managed Keerthivasan, created_date:-2009-03-31 21:20:09, summary:-It is so many years now, since I worked with Keerthi last. But, if there is any truth in the adage that a great tree is known by its sapling, I would say, Keerthi just can't surprise me by whatever he achieves. He deserves all that and more. Is capable of all that and more. That rare combo of good communicator, good thinker, lucid developer, and chummy comrade. That's what Keerthi was to me. That was nine years and more ago. I wish him all the best, and will him to pursue higher dreams and loftier ideals., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAotAAAAJDI4NjViNTQ2LWI1NWMtNGZiYi1hZGE2LTk4M2FkNmE0YzBjZg.jpg, profile_member_id:-23340218, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/keerthivasanr/, recommendation_id:-10017527 <> last_name:-(Mali), name:-Lingeswaran (Mali), date_and_relationship:-2008-03-21 06:11:01, Rajendran managed Lingeswaran, created_date:-2008-03-21 06:11:01, summary:-The only reason I am afraid to write a good recommendation about Mali (that he richly deserves, by the way), is the fear that somebody, seeing this, might be inclined to have a meet up with him, and get attracted to his innocent smartness, his down-to-earth appeal and his no-nonsense will to win, and end up looping him in as a colleague or partner. For, I have reserved him, if not now, someday in the future, and wouldn't want to dig my own hole by letting him be 'wooed away' by a competitor. So, no. I won't write a recommendation about Mali., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAA2hAAAAJDIyZTg5MGY4LTViNDYtNGE4YS1iYTZlLWMwOTkyNTBiNGMxNg.jpg, profile_member_id:-7118073, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/lingeswaran/, recommendation_id:-4064670 <> last_name:-Iyer, name:-Geetha Iyer, date_and_relationship:-2008-03-04 03:52:09, Rajendran senior than Geetha, created_date:-2008-03-04 03:52:09, summary:-Geetha is among the rare species of Account Managers who are passionate about managing accounts, and actually in fact end up doing such a great job that the client thinks that they are firmly on THEIR side while we smugly know that she is doing her best to get the client to see sense in what we say. She has the unique ability to ask a person to "go to hell" with such a winsome smile in her face, that the person will actually start looking forward to the trip. I am jealous of the coworkers that she has now, for I know what a breath of fresh air she can be when times are bad and the chips are down. May she have almost all her dreams fulfilled (for, fulfilling EVERY one of them might change her from the wonderful person she is now!) Rajendran., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAc6AAAAJDdhYzU2ZWFjLTcyNTAtNDVjOC1iM2YxLTg3YWIyNDcwYTI0Nw.jpg, profile_member_id:-12486946, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/geethaiyer/, recommendation_id:-3825772 <> last_name:-Rabin, name:-Ruhani Rabin, date_and_relationship:-2007-07-18 06:21:20, worked in different companies, created_date:-2007-07-18 06:21:20, summary:-He has excellent writing skills. And a great knack of getting to the point. It is not easy to cover 2.0 technology without resorting to hyperbole and without falling for the overblown expectations on every new startup. exp_summary1: I work on the core Box web experience.
exp_summary2: I worked on web testing infrastructure and frameworks for the Web Tools team. - I maintained Twitter's legacy web testing platform, contributed major performance enhancements, and addressed its technical debt. - I helped design and implement a next-generation cloud-based web testing platform. - I onboarded new team members and provided customer support to the Twitter web team.
exp_summary3: (SlideShare was an independent company until its acquisition by LinkedIn in May 2012) For most of my time at SlideShare, I was the only frontend developer in the SF office, drawing on my HTML/CSS/JS experience to make visual improvements and performance enhancements to SlideShare's player. - I helped improve the pageload speed of the SlideShare player page: https://engineering.linkedin.com/slideshare/10-ways-we-made-slideshare-faster - I owned analytics processing scripts that reported key SlideShare metrics to LinkedIn's internal systems. - I owned SlideShare's integration with our third-party i18n provider, with which we translated the site into French, German, Spanish and Portuguese. Technologies used: JS, Ruby, Python
exp_summary4: - I rewrote the SendTab service from PHP into JavaScript, enabling it to serve an order of magnitude more traffic. - I contributed to the open-source PeoplePods framework, with which we built websites for a variety of clients. - I contributed mobile-first, responsive CSS to grammy.com in the runup to the 2012 Grammy Awards.
exp_summary5: Developed content-managed websites for a wide range of clients.
exp_summary6: Developed content-managed websites for heavy-industrial clients.

name: Vinayagam Arunachalam
headline: Manager Computational Biology at Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
summary: Leadership: Over 10 years of research experience in Computational Biology/Bioinformatics and Systems Biology. Developed research strategies to identify therapeutic targets by applying my expertise in Genetics, Proteomics, Machine learning, Networks and Pathways. Proven track record of leading collaborations with scientists from diverse expertise. Supervised PhD and MS level scientists. Published a book and more than 30 publications in top-tier journals (10 first authorship and 5 corresponding authorship). Research expertise - Target identification from large-scale population genetics data - Pathways, Molecular interaction networks & Causal network analysis - Integrating and mining genomic, functional genomic, proteomic & post-translational modification datasets - Machine Learning, Pattern recognition & Big data analysis - Sequence analysis and function prediction - Protein structure prediction: Fold recognition, modeling, visualization
